I have ordered some.  Too early to see results.  Great customer service if nothing else.  I was surprised how informative the person I talked to was.

Quick update.  I have seen some good (not dramatic results)--maybe 30 points on average.  Vitabase is actually offering a free 60 day supply right now at http://www.vitabase.com/landing/blood_sugar_program_intro.aspx.  I cannot do it because it is for first time customers only.

question: People on some other forums are raving about Vitabase blood Sugar Formula.  Anyone have experience with it?  I found some very positive reviews here: http://www.nutritionaltree.com/reviews/diabetes/special-combinations/vitabase_blood-sugar-formula.aspx
title: Vitabase
